00041 double rotator_get_multiplier(void) {
00042         return((double)((double)(rotator_settings.rotation_max) - (double)(rotator_settings.rotation_min)) / (double)(rotator_settings.rotation_degree_max));
00043 }

00066 void rotator_release_break(void) {
00067         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET1))
00068                 ext_ctrl_fet1_activate();
00069         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET2))
00070                 ext_ctrl_fet2_activate();
00071         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY1))
00072                 ext_ctrl_relay1_activate();
00073         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY2))
00074                 ext_ctrl_relay2_activate();
00075         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY3))
00076                 ext_ctrl_relay3_activate();
00077         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY4))
00078                 ext_ctrl_relay4_activate();
00079 }
00080 
00081 void rotator_activate_break(void) {
00082         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET1))
00083                 ext_ctrl_fet1_deactivate();
00084         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET2))
00085                 ext_ctrl_fet2_deactivate();
00086         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY1))
00087                 ext_ctrl_relay1_deactivate();
00088         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY2))
00089                 ext_ctrl_relay2_deactivate();
00090         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY3))
00091                 ext_ctrl_relay3_deactivate();
00092         if (rotator_settings.break_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY4))
00093                 ext_ctrl_relay4_deactivate();
00094 }
00095 
00096 void rotator_rotate_cw(void) {
00097                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET1))
00098                         ext_ctrl_fet1_activate();
00099                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET2))
00100                         ext_ctrl_fet2_activate();
00101                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY1))
00102                         ext_ctrl_relay1_activate();
00103                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY2))
00104                         ext_ctrl_relay2_activate();
00105                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY3))
00106                         ext_ctrl_relay3_activate();
00107                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY4))
00108                         ext_ctrl_relay4_activate();
00109 }
00110 
00111 void rotator_rotate_ccw(void) {
00112                 if (rotator_settings.ccw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET1))
00113                         ext_ctrl_fet1_activate();
00114                 if (rotator_settings.ccw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET2))
00115                         ext_ctrl_fet2_activate();
00116                 if (rotator_settings.ccw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY1))
00117                         ext_ctrl_relay1_activate();
00118                 if (rotator_settings.ccw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY2))
00119                         ext_ctrl_relay2_activate();
00120                 if (rotator_settings.ccw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY3))

00122                 if (rotator_settings.ccw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY4))

00126 void rotator_stop_cw(void) {
00127                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET1))
00128                         ext_ctrl_fet1_deactivate();
00129                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_FET2))

00131                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY1))

00133                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY2))

00137                 if (rotator_settings.cw_output & (1<<ROTATION_OUTPUT_RELAY4))
